Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.lobby

Class Lobby

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.lobby.Lobby
public class Lobby
extends java.lang.Object
this class is the lobby representation and is used to populate a lobby and then to start a match

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Lobby​(int gameNumOfPlayers, java.lang.String password)  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addPlayer​(VirtualClient newPlayer)
    registering a player to this lobby
    java.lang.String getPassword()  
    boolean isFull()  
    void startGame()
    this is the method called by the lobbyManager thread as soon as he finds out that the lobby is full this method creates a serverThread for each player that will interact with that player and with the model(MasterController) together with the other serverTreads

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • startGame

      public void startGame() throws java.io.IOException
      this is the method called by the lobbyManager thread as soon as he finds out that the lobby is full this method creates a serverThread for each player that will interact with that player and with the model(MasterController) together with the other serverTreads
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
